name: Review Test Structure
description: Examine the overall layout of the test, including the number of questions and types of questions (multiple-choice, images, etc.), to understand the requirements for successful completion.
expected_output: A detailed report outlining the structure of the test including total questions and their types.

name: Study Provided Material
description: Gather and study the necessary material that corresponds to the questions in the test to answer correctly.
expected_output: A list of key points and facts derived from the study material that will assist in answering the test questions.

name: Answer Multiple Choice Questions
description: Go through each multiple-choice question and select the best answer based on the information provided in the test and the studied material.
expected_output: A compiled set of selected answers for all multiple-choice questions.

name: Verify Answers
description: Double-check the selected answers for accuracy, ensuring that they align with the studied material and understanding of the topics.
expected_output: A finalized list of answers validated for correctness before submission.

name: Submit Test
description: Once all questions have been answered and verified, submit the completed test for grading.
